protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Phosphorylates a large number of substrates in the cytoplasm and the nucleus

reference.reference_text: Maldonado F, Hanks SK: A cDNA clone encoding human cAMP-dependent protein kinase catalytic subunit C alpha. Nucleic Acids Res. 1988 Aug 25;16(16):8189-90.
